description.narrative: • Explore the viability of using light, solar-powered vehicles as means of commercial transportation in peri­urban and rural Ghana and whether this transportation service could be franchised to provide employment opportunities to youth. • This project will be innovative in a number of ways: Promotion of solar-powered transportation which is highly unexplored; Explore the viability of solar-powered transportation hubs as a business model with the potential to offer employment through vehicle maintenance and repair, battery charging and other related services. Expand on mobile payment options in the transportation sector.
